settings.text:
Our innate nature is to take care of each other.  We attract and work with those with the same mentality.  

Our team works every single day to ensure a world in which organic actually means organic—and in which farmers, manufacturers, and consumers come together as one in the name of thriving communities and a happy planet.

settings.heading: We believe in using business as a force for good
settings.text:
We act in accordance of a common ethical ground. 

We evaluate decisions based on the considerations of keeping all parties whole 

Our communication is direct and upfront 

We always do our best to deliver the absolute best quality in organic ingredients. 

We strive for endless innovation 

We give back to those around us and act in consideration of those in need. 

We believe in building our local community and global community through the positive impact of our employees

We want our customers to have confidence in our business ethics and commitment to acting in a way that improves the lives of all stakeholders.

We are accountable in our everyday decisions and the impact they make on the global environment.  

We engage consciously with our suppliers, customers, employees and partners in an effort to build a healthier planet and thriving communities.

We believe the more organic ingredients we sell, the greater the impact on the global food supply, 

We want team members who come to work feeling like they are making a difference and recognize they are an essential part of providing healthy healing foods around the globe.

We care for each other. We express our needs and meet them.   

We encourage collaboration, expression and teamwork. 

We value inquisitive minds and positive attitudes

We act in commitment to our common goals, valuing each team member and customer equally.

We remain flexible to accommodate customers and employees. We are known for being responsive to the demands of the world.  

We understand that life happens. 

We make time for the things that matter most, minimizing distractions from our highest goals 

We lead by example.  We do not judge, but work to understand our perceptions. 

We focus on educating ourselves, our customers and suppliers and encourage personal and career development. 

We treat our partners, employees and customers like family.  Our goal is to thrive together.

We respect our natural resources and use them consciously.
